songs.title: Messages
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Honey, so long
Nice to see you
Won't be long before I come back home
When the plane lands, will you reach me?
Will you call me on the telephone?

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell my son I wish I never yelled at him, yesterday
'Cause everything's changed
Radar signal seeking you, but finding nothing at all
Hey
Blow the horn and call the cavalry, there's something happening
Hey

[Chorus]
Goodbye

[Verse 2]
Goodbye, mother
Tell my daughter
Have to leave, get off the telephone
There's a problem, sinking feeling
Heroes dying, plastic armor on

[Pre-Chorus]
Tell my son I wish I never yelled at him, yesterday
'Cause everything's changed
And you, you gave me all you had
Hey
I hope, someday, you will be happy without me

[Chorus]
Goodbye

[Bridge]
Lost in a world that's quickly going mad
A human being so stricken to the ground
Angels and the demons fight, to save the light
While all the others cry

[Solo]

[Verse 3]
As for you, you made my life worth living
Hey
I pray, one day, you will be happy without me

[Chorus]
Goodbye
Goodbye
